Detailed Description

Encapsulates database access in easy to use objects.

Allows really easy access to an sqlite database without having to worry about sqlite statements. Core class is the Database. You create Tables associated with a database to which you can add Columns and then Rows.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum db_types_t

the column type enumeration

Enumerator:
db_type_int  integer type
db_type_str  string type

enum defer_types_t

the defer type enumeration

Enumerator:
defer_force  Force the call to defer until commit is called.
defer_none  Force the call to commit immediately.
